/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The street, bathed in the warm glow of the sun, is flanked by trees on both sides, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. A red car, vibrant against the muted colors of the surroundings, is parked on the right side of the street, adding a pop of color to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings in the background. The perspective of the image is from the middle of the street, looking towards the horizon, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene.
